options.name: Beginner Slasher
options.description: Gain +1 Attack and +1 Damage with Slashing Weapons. Gain a Fighting Stance.

options.name: Reaction : Flank
options.description: When an Allied Creature makes a Melee Attack against a target within your Melee Range, you can make an Attack against that same target with a 1d4 Bonus.

options.name: Novice Slasher
options.description: Gain +1 Attack with Slashing Weapons and Learn a Fighting Stance from the Stance Table

options.name: Action : Sweeping Slash
options.description: Make a normal Attack with a Slashing Weapon against 2 Creatures within your Melee Range.

options.name: Reaction : Riposte
options.description: When you Dodge or Block an Attack, you can make an Attack against that Creature if they are within Melee Range of you

options.name: Journeyman Slasher
options.description: Gain +1 Attack with Slashing Weapons and gain access to the Attack of Opportunity Reaction

options.name: Powerful Blows
options.description: Gain +1 Damage with Slashing Weapons, Piercing and Crushing Weapons and +1 Damage with Unarmed Strikes

options.name: Free Action : Quick Attack
options.description: If you have not used an Attack Action or Special Action on this turn, you can make a fast Attack with a Light Slashing Weapon

options.name: Expert Slasher
options.description: Gain Critical Hits and +1 Attack with Slashing Weapons

options.name: Free Action : Glory Kill
options.description: Gain an extra action when your Slashing Weapon brings a Creature to 0 Health

options.name: Master Slasher
options.description: Gain Brutal Critical Hits with Slashing Weapons and Gain +1 Attack and Damage with Slashing Weapons

options.name: Free Action : Amputation
options.description: When you score a Brutal Critical Hit, you can target a Leg or Arm with a Called Shot before rolling your Damage.

options.name: Action : Powerslash
options.description: You move up to 2 Units and then make a Melee Attack with a Slashing Weapon, increasing your True Hit threshold by 1. If your Attack is a True Hit, all Physical Damage from the Attack becomes True Damage.

options.name: Grandmaster Slasher
options.description: Your Damage Die for Slashing Weapons are upgraded (1-Handed Light: 2d6, 1-Handed Heavy: 2d8, 2-Handed Light: 3d6, 2-Handed Heavy: 3d8)
